Interface LCSArray

All Superinterfaces:
ControllerIO, Device, SonarObject
All Known Implementing Classes:
LCSArrayImpl
public interface LCSArray extends Device
A Lane-Use Control Signal Array is a series of LCS devices across all lanes of a roadway corridor.
Author:
Douglas Lau
